comments.creator: hyypia118@hotmail.com
comments.text:
User-Agent:       Mozilla/5.0 (Windows NT 5.1; rv:2.0b12) Gecko/20100101 Firefox/4.0b12
Build Identifier: Mozilla/5.0 (Windows NT 5.1; rv:2.0b12) Gecko/20100101 Firefox/4.0b12

micro blog website t.sina.cn (web version is t.sina.com.cn) can't be accessed using Firefox 4.0 Beta for Maemo. Default browser for Maemo can get access.

Test platform: Maemo on Nokia N900
System: Maemo 5
Version: 20.2010.36-2.002

Reproducible: Always

Steps to Reproduce:
1.Open Firefox on N900
2.Type "t.sina.cn" in address bar
3.Press Enter key on N900 keyboard 
Actual Results:  
Webpage can't load

Expected Results:  
Showing web content
comments.author: hyypia118@hotmail.com

comments.text: Does this occur on the latest version of Firefox 4 for Maemo?
